content.body: How should issue sections be marked in bikeshed? There is [one in Web IDL](https://webidl.spec.whatwg.org/#idl-callback-functions) with just  `class="issue"` that isn't styled appropriately and thus reads as a (weird) normative section.
content.formatted_body: How should issue sections be marked in bikeshed? There is one in Web IDL with just class="issue" that isn't styled appropriately and thus reads as a (weird) normative section.
